title: Hot Springs National Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      The park and Gulpha Gorge Campground are open year round. The Fordyce Bathhouse Visitor Center is open daily 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. except January 1, Thanksgiving Day, and December 25. Self-guided tours are available all day; guided tours are offered daily staffing-permitting.
